attributes.action: ensure the forthcoming TV election debates for the 2010 General Election between the main party leaders address social care issues relevant to people with a disability who are of a working age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To highlight the importance of addressing the social care needs of disabled people of a working age during the TV debates of the main party leaders in the General Election campaign 2010.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the appropriate political parties.
